statements: DELETE FROM learning_experience WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM learning_experience WHERE student_id = 123 AND completion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM learning_experience WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01' AND course_id = 456;
DELETE FROM learning_experience WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' AND age > 20;
DELETE FROM courses WHERE credits < 3 OR dept = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM students WHERE major = 'Biology' AND age > 25;
DELETE FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 3 AND student_id = 2;
